body.p: Yours of yesterday rec'd this morning—I shall leave here in the 4:30 P M Camden via Trenton to NY train to-morrow, Wednesday, & expect to be in Jersey City by or before 7, early evening—A friend, R. Pearsall Smith is convoying me, & I understand I am to go with him to the Westminster Hotel, for the night—Yes, meet me in Jersey City—I shall expect you: —the young man Wm Duckett is coming on with me—I am feeling better than for the last two weeks, & shall go through with the lecture, according to announcement—I am to have, (according to wish & arrangement of Mr Smith) a reception at Westminster Hotel, Thursday evening—returning here Friday—
